subject: American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the first Triple Crown winner in 37 years, received a warm welcome upon arriving at Monmouth Park in New Jersey. He is preparing to race on Aug. 2 in the Haskell Invitational.
snippet: American Pharoah, the first Triple Crown winner in 37 years, received a warm welcome upon arriving at Monmouth Park in New Jersey. He is preparing to race on Aug. 2 in the Haskell Invitational.
